mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (schedule_id, user_id, non_user_id, price, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{userId}, #{nonUserId}, #{price}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
INSERT INTO reservation_count (reservation_id, age_type, count, price) VALUES (#{reservationId}, #{ageType}, #{count}, #{price})
INSERT INTO reservation_seat (schedule_id, seat_id, created_at) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{seatId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT ss.schedule_id AS scheduleId, ss.screen_id AS screenId FROM screen_schedule ss WHERE ss.running_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT s.seat_id AS seatId, s.screen_id AS screenId, s.row_label AS rowLabel, s.col_no AS colNo FROM seat s WHERE s.screen_id = #{screenId} AND s.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY s.row_label, s.col_no

SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.schedule_id AS scheduleId, SUM(rc.count) AS personCount FROM reservation r JOIN reservation_count rc ON rc.reservation_id = r.reservation_id WHERE r.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND r.status IN (0, 1) GROUP BY r.reservation_id, r.schedule_id
SELECT reservation_id, user_id, non_user_id, price, updated_at FROM reservation WHERE r.status != 0
SELECT o.order_id, o.price, o.status, o.created_at, o.updated_at FROM order o JOIN store_item s ON s.store_item_id = o.store_item_id WHERE s.payment_type = 0

SELECT td.benefit_code, td.benefit_id, td.applied_amount FROM reservation_seat_list rsl JOIN ticket_discount td ON td.reservation_seat_id = rsl.reservation_seat_id WHERE rsl.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment SET payment_type = #{paymentType}, type_id = #{typeId}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, origin_amount = #{originAmount}, discount_total = #{discountTotal}, amount = #{amount}, status = #{status}, completed_at = #{completedAt}, cancelled_at = #{cancelledAt}
INSERT INTO point_log SET user_id = #{userId}, payment_id = #{paymentId}, change_amount = #{changeAmount}, balance_after = #{balanceAfter}, status = #{status}

INSERT INTO payment_card SET payment_id = #{paymentId}, card_company_code = #{cardCompanyCode}, card_number = #{cardNumber}, installment_months = #{installmentMonths}, card_approval_number = #{cardApprovalNumber}
INSERT INTO payment_bank_transfer SET payment_id = #{paymentId}, bank_code = #{bankCode}, account_number = #{accountNumber}, account_holder_name = #{accountHolderName}
